audioText: Elle revoit ses anciens amis d'université lors de réunions annuelles organisées dans la capitale pour maintenir les liens.
question: When does she see her old university friends again?
options: At annual reunions organized in the capital to maintain connections
During regular weekend visits to their home cities
Only at special occasions like weddings and births
Through monthly video calls and social media
explanation: The text states 'Elle revoit ses anciens amis d'université lors de réunions annuelles organisées dans la capitale pour maintenir les liens.' - She sees her old university friends again at annual reunions organized in the capital to maintain connections. 'Revoit' is the third person singular present form of 'revoir' (to see again).
